skill.name: biomni
skill.description: Autonomous biomedical AI agent framework for executing complex research tasks across genomics, drug discovery, molecular biology, and clinical analysis. Use this skill when conducting multi-step biomedical research including CRISPR screening design, single-cell RNA-seq analysis, ADMET prediction, GWAS interpretation, rare disease diagnosis, or lab protocol optimization. Leverages LLM reasoning with code execution and integrated biomedical databases.
skill.summary: Autonomous biomedical AI agent framework for executing complex research tasks across genomics, drug ...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: No credential harvesting, exfiltration, or hidden network activity found in the scanned files. Scripts focus on local setup and report generation without persistence or remote execution.

content.user_title: Run autonomous biomedical research with Biomni
content.value_statement: Complex biomedical tasks require many steps and tools. Biomni automates planning, analysis, and reporting across genomics and drug discovery workflows.
actual_capabilities: Initialize the A1 agent and run biomedical tasks with natural language queries
Save conversation history to PDF, HTML, or Markdown reports
Configure LLM providers and API keys for multiple backends
Integrate MCP servers via a JSON configuration file
Evaluate outputs with the BiomniEval1 benchmarking framework
limitations: Requires external LLM API keys to run real tasks
Downloads a large data lake of about 11GB on first use
Generated code execution is enabled by default and is not sandboxed
Setup guidance assumes conda is available

use_cases.title: Design CRISPR screens
use_cases.description: Plan sgRNA libraries and prioritize genes for functional screening experiments.

use_cases.title: Analyze single cell data
use_cases.description: Run clustering, annotation, and differential expression workflows on scRNA-seq datasets.

use_cases.title: Assess ADMET risks
use_cases.description: Summarize absorption, metabolism, and toxicity properties for candidate compounds.

prompt_templates.title: Start a simple query
prompt_templates.prompt: Explain the main functions of the BRCA1 gene and list key associated diseases.

prompt_templates.title: Plan a CRISPR screen
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a CRISPR knockout screen for autophagy in HEK293 cells with gene prioritization criteria.

prompt_templates.title: Run scRNA analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze this scRNA-seq dataset: perform QC, clustering, cell type annotation, and differential expression. File path: ./data/sample.h5ad.

prompt_templates.title: Interpret GWAS results
prompt_templates.prompt: Interpret GWAS summary stats for type 2 diabetes: find significant variants, map to genes, and run pathway enrichment. File: ./data/gwas.txt.

output_examples.input: Design a CRISPR screen to identify autophagy genes in HEK293 cells.
output: Defined screening goal and phenotype readout
Recommended genome wide sgRNA library with controls
Listed top candidate pathways and expected hit genes
Outlined follow up validation steps and reporting format

best_practices: Provide organism, cell type, and clear output requirements
Review generated code before execution in sensitive environments
Reuse the data lake directory across projects to save time
anti_patterns: Run tasks without any API key configured
Ignore warnings about code execution and sandboxing
Use vague prompts without data paths or constraints

faq.question: Which LLM providers are supported?
faq.answer: Anthropic Claude, OpenAI, Azure OpenAI, Google Gemini, Groq, and AWS Bedrock are supported.

faq.question: What are the main usage limits?
faq.answer: You need API quotas from your provider and local disk space for the data lake download.

faq.question: Can I integrate external tools?
faq.answer: Yes. Provide an MCP configuration file to connect external databases or services.

faq.question: How is my data handled?
faq.answer: Data stays on your machine. The scripts do not transmit files or credentials.

faq.question: What if setup fails?
faq.answer: Verify conda and API keys, then rerun the setup script or use the docs in references.

faq.question: How does this compare to a standard LLM chat?
faq.answer: Biomni plans multi-step workflows, executes code, and produces structured reports for research tasks.
